label: uncl5213
comment: Code specifying the price change operation for a sub- line item.

values.label: Added to the baseline item unit price
values.comment: Price is to be added to the base line unit price.

values.label: Included in the baseline item unit price
values.comment: Price is included in the base line unit price.

values.label: Subtracted from the baseline item unit price
values.comment: Price is to be subtracted from the base line unit price.
